channel.title: Need the CLASSPATH and PATH Codes For My Java Version
channel.description:
Hello, I've followed the tut perfectly, but i don't really know which type of java i have. every time i download it, it brings me to this weird downloading program which i have a pic of, but idk what type of java it is so idk what to put in my classpath and path files
here is the pic of the download screen - [IMG]http://img374.imageshack.us/img374/7734/javathingrq9.jpg[/img]
please can someone just tell me what to put in my classpath and path files that would be great, because i keep getting a box that pops up really fast then closes when i try to run runserver.bat and it says 'java' is not recognized as an external or internal command, something, or a batch file". my friend told me thats because my classpath and path files were wrong. please help now i want to start my server tonight.

item.title: Need the CLASSPATH and PATH Codes For My Java Version
item.dc:creator: @an_apple an apple
item.description:
@an_apple wrote:

ok that made something different happen which is good, we’ll see if this works in about 4 minutes when its done downloading.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2008, 11:58:25 PM[/size][hr]Ok it downloaded the file Java™ SE Development Kit 6. now that are the classpath and path file codes for that version?

Read full topic
item.source: Need the CLASSPATH and PATH Codes For My Java Version
